name: Sums to Zero?
desc: Write a function `sumsToZero(a: Array): Boolean` that checks whether any subarray of an integer array `a` sums to zero. For example, `sumsToZero([2, -3, 7, 1, 5, -6, 11])` would produce `true` because the subarray `[1, 5, -6]` sums to zero. You'll be tested on *very* large arrays!
